statements: SELECT * FROM product_demand_forecasting
SELECT product_name, sales_data->'sales_total' as total_sales FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_id, product_name, market_factors->'competition' as competition FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE market_factors->>'trends' = 'growing'
SELECT product_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(sales_data->'monthly_sales') as monthly_sales FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE product_id = 2
SELECT product_id, product_name, market_factors->'target_audience' as target_audience FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE market_factors->'competition'->>'main_competitor' = 'Company X'
SELECT * FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_factors FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE sales_data->>'sales_quantity' > '500' ORDER BY product_name LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_id, product_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(sales_data->'monthly_sales') AS monthly_sales FROM product_demand_forecasting WHERE product_name LIKE '%S%' AND market_factors ? 'competition';
SELECT product_id, jsonb_agg(market_factors) AS market_factors_agg FROM product_demand_forecasting GROUP BY product_id HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100
SELECT MAX(quantity_sold) AS max_quantity FROM SalesData
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM MarketFactors WHERE factor_value > 0.5
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_id = 4
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM MarketFactors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%market%' ORDER BY factor_id DESC
SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold, AVG(quantity_sold) AS average_quantity_sold FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM SalesData JOIN MarketFactors ON SalesData.product_id = MarketFactors.factor_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_factors ORDER BY factor_value ASC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM market_factors WHERE factor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM market_factors ORDER BY factor_value DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_amount, forecast_date FROM product_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sf.factor_name, pf.forecast_amount FROM market_factors sf INNER JOIN product_forecast pf ON sf.factor_id = pf.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, date, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT forecast_id, date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Home & Furniture' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT pc.product_name, df.forecast_value FROM product_catalog pc JOIN demand_forecast df ON pc.product_id = df.product_id WHERE df.date >= '2022-01-01' AND df.date <= '2022-01-15';
SELECT sf.factor_name, sf.factor_value, pc.product_name FROM market_factors sf LEFT JOIN product_catalog pc ON sf.factor_id = pc.product_id WHERE sf.factor_value > 0.5 ORDER BY sf.factor_value DESC;
SELECT sd.product_id, sd.date, sd.sales_amount, pc.product_name FROM sales_data sd JOIN product_catalog pc ON sd.product_id = pc.product_id WHERE sd.sales_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY sd.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_id, name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location IN ('USA', 'Canada');
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, price FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50 AND category = 'Electronics'
SELECT p.name AS product_name, m.date AS market_date, m.factor_name, m.factor_value FROM Products p INNER JOIN MarketFactors m ON p.id = m.id
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, s.location, ps.name AS contact_person FROM Suppliers s LEFT JOIN Products p ON s.id = p.supplier_id LEFT JOIN Suppliers ps ON s.id = ps.id
SELECT p.name AS product_name, d.forecast_date, d.forecast_value FROM Products p LEFT JOIN DemandForecast d ON p.id = d.product_id WHERE d.forecast_value > 100
